title: new player help
body:
I thought there was a forum where people help new players and I can't locate that forum now.  Do you know if it's here at this site?   It was a place I could write questions to and where someone would mentor me, I believe.

Thanks!

replies.body:
Welcome to the Rift Sinewaver!

You'll be able to get some helpful tips if you post over in [**Gameplay **](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance) and you can always look for teammates at [**Player Recruitment**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment)!
